name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deal Scout for Gmail: Promo Tab Deal Finder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches your Gmail Promotions Tab for deals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deal Scout searches your Gmail Promo Tab for great deals and coupons and displays the best deals and coupon codes while you're shopping. You can open Deal Scout on any site you're shopping on and it will show you all the deals and coupon codes for that site.
